level.heading: Uniformity of application and construction.
level.text: This chapter shall be applied and construed to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law with respect to the subject of this chapter among states enacting it.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-87, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 21-301.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 23 of the Uniform Transfers to Minors Act. See 8B Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
